description: This hearty Brussels sprout fried rice has crispy fried rice and shaved Brussels sprouts with spicy chunks of baked sriracha marinated tofu.
name: Brussels Sprout Fried Rice with Spicy Baked Tofu
recipeIngredient: 7 ounces extra firm tofu (half of a 14 ounce package), (drained and pressed at least 20 minutes)
3 scallions, (chopped, white and green parts separated)
3 cups very thinly sliced Brussels sprouts
3 cups cooked rice, (preferably a day or so old and chilled)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the soy sauce, sriracha, vinegar, maple syrup and sesame oil together in a small bowl. Add the tofu cubes and toss to coat.

Arrange the tofu cubes in an even layer on a parchment lined baking sheet, reserving any excess marinade. Bake for 15 minutes, then gently turn and spoon or brush reserved marinade over cubes. Bake another 15 minutes, until crispy in spots.
